type.description: The type of the item. Always `shell_call`.

id.description: The unique ID of the shell tool call. Populated when this item is returned via API.

call_id.description: The unique ID of the shell tool call generated by the model.

action.description: The shell commands and limits that describe how to run the tool call.

status.description: The status of the shell call. One of `in_progress`, `completed`, or `incomplete`.

created_by.description: The ID of the entity that created this tool call.

title: Shell tool call
description: A tool call that executes one or more shell commands in a managed environment.
